item.title: ğŸŸ¡ 11:20 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in: - Myrivska territorial community - Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community - Pokrovska territorial community - Chervonogryhorivska territorial community
item.description: ğŸŸ¡ 11:20 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in: - Myrivska territorial community - Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community - Pokrovska territorial community - Chervonogryhorivska territorial community #Dnipropetrovsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
